bioAsHtml: Phil is a Senior Technical Staff Member with IBM's Cloud division, working directly on open source cloud technologies for the Open Technology and Cloud Performance team. The Open Technology team leads IBM's involvement in open source cloud communities, including Docker, Cloud Foundry, and OpenStack. Phil is currently a core contributor and maintainer on the Docker project and works with IBM customers on early adoption and proof-of-concepts around Docker, Open Stack and other leading cloud open source projects.

acceptedTalks.title: The Power of Open Source, Open Containers, and an Open Cloud
